```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

tidyr::crossing(
  n = seq(5, 100, 5),
  k = 1:1000
) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(r = cor(rnorm(n), rnorm(n))) %>% 
  group_by(n) %>% 
  summarise(sd_r = sd(r)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n , sd_r)) +
  geom_line()
```
